name: The Block Pro
title: Current Trends In Ethereum Blobspace
text:
Synopsis
Ethereum's Dencun upgrade in March 2024 introduced proto-danksharding (EIP-4844), creating a separate fee market for blobspace, while the broader crypto market experienced volatility due to Federal Reserve monetary policy expectations.

Key Insights
- Proto-danksharding (EIP-4844) was implemented in the Ethereum Dencun upgrade in March 2024, establishing an independent fee market for blobspace
- Layer 2 networks saw a total value locked (TVL) decline of 8.2% in December 2024, dropping over $4 billion
- Crypto markets reacted negatively to the U.S. Federal Reserve's indication of fewer rate cuts than expected in 2025
- ai16z, a decentralized autonomous organization, launched the ELIZA framework to incorporate AI into treasury management and investment strategies
